title: Bore well/Tube well/Open well:(a) May be constructed with the locational approval from the Hydraulic Engineering Department of MCGM
clause_text: Bore well/Tube well/Open well:(a) May be constructed with the locational approval from the Hydraulic Engineering Department of MCGM.The construction shall be as per the provision of State Ground Water Survey Department.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Bore well/Tube well/Open well:(a) May be constructed with the locational approval from the Hydraulic Engineering Department of MCGM.The construction shall be as per the provision of State Ground Water
